website_summaries.verdict: Embrace social cooking with this 1500W powerhouse.
pros: 1500W of heating power and a cooking surface measuring 18.5 x 9 inches allow you to host parties and feed big families
The reversible grill plate provides stellar adaptability, as does the wide-band temperate control that ranges from 392 to 536 ℉
cons: This product does not include wooden spatulas

customer_reviews.title: Korean BBQ at home!
customer_reviews.text: My family really enjoys Korean BBQ, but it gets spend. So we invested in this. It's pretty close to taste. You definitely need thin cuts of meat which can be hard to do at home.
customer_reviews.author: Jaz

customer_reviews.title: A small but useful grill
customer_reviews.text: I have a large grill in my house, on weekends I would gather my friends together and have an indoor BBQ party, but some times even if only me I would like to make some grilled food, it's too troublesome to use the large grill because every time I have to spend at least 20 minutes to clean it. luckily I found this small grill, it perfectly satisfies my wish to eat BBQ myself, easy to clean, and the temperature is very high, as a BBQ fan I finally can enjoy BBQ after works.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Indoor BBQ , smoke less ! Work great !
customer_reviews.text: First time try to buy the grill so we can stay home BBQ , every time we go Korean BBQ it was good , but just little bit too expensive ! This grill is not that expensive but work perfect ! The only thing i like is this one can do it indoor ! Very smoke less ! We were so happy got this one ! Not outdoor BBQ have a lot of mosquito ! We can sitting around the table and grill and eat ! So glad to get this ! And we can eat BBQ once a week !
customer_reviews.author: Danny Z

customer_reviews.title: A most have for people who want to BBQ indoors
customer_reviews.text: We love BBQ but it is always challenging to have BBQ in winter. This is the answer. Buy it if you have a grill at your balcony and don't want to give up the fun during wintertime.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Ma

customer_reviews.title: Takes awhile to cook your thick steak.
customer_reviews.text: I love this grill. No smoke or splatter. Easy to clean, according to my hubby. The meat takes the better part of a half hour for a thick slice but is tastes as good as any restaurant steak I’ve ever had. I highly recommend this unit.
customer_reviews.author: margie

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like the outdoor grill
customer_reviews.text: Tastes like the outdoor grill. Can be difficult to clean but worth the work for the evenly distribution heat and cooking
customer_reviews.author: Rachel DeBolt

customer_reviews.title: Great to grill at the inside of house without the smoke.
customer_reviews.text: Worked as described. It was easy to use and clean. The temperature that other people taked about was not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just received and will be using tonight as for now it is a 5 star but will update after use super easy to assemble and easy to take apart clean looking very fashionable if you decide to leave it on the counter
customer_reviews.author: philip

customer_reviews.title: save your money
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't get hot enough, I suspect the manufacturer measured the temp. on the element not the actual cooking surface. I made ribs over the weekend and despite boiling them first it still took 30 minutes per side to get faint grill marks and slightly char the barbecue sauce I also cooked a medium rare steak and it took 45 minutes to cook.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: IT'S NOT AS ADVERTISED
customer_reviews.text: grill a steak the product never became hot enough to grill (as seen on TV) i tried chicken breasts and had the same experience. However did remove all visible smoke as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Erma Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Convenience Grill Tool for a Family
customer_reviews.text: It came well packed. I was worrying that the size would be too big. It is not as big as I thought. Just right for a family. I love the little trays on the bottom level. It fits a pair of chicken wings perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Joys

customer_reviews.title: No Smoke!
customer_reviews.text: It’s real smokeless! I love BBQ with my families at weekend, but lazy to set up everything outside the house, smoke gonna be a problem BBQ inside home, this grill solved this problem. tried couple times, I can’t say it’s 100% smokeless, at least 90% Smoke gone, really love it!
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: Does not Cook well took 2 long. Also was missing piece had to reorder
customer_reviews.author: LUCIANNA -BOSTON

customer_reviews.title: My friend enjoyed it very much!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this grill machine as a gift when she moved to her new house. She started to use it within hours of getting it. It did a great job the food was delicious. This grill is handy and can be used both indoor and outdoor. Basically anywhere. The grill plates are easy to remove and reinsert. They clean up easily with soap & water and are also dishwasher proof. The grill heats up quickly and evenly. The size is just perfect when cooking for family gatherings up to 6-8 people. A great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Smokeless Wonder
customer_reviews.text: I live in a tiny basement apartment. Every time I use my small oven, the smoke alarm goes off (This is not a reflection on my culinary skills!) I got tired of having my one room house full with smoke when cooking. I received the grill today. I was so excited I opened, assembled and seasoned it immediately. I even ran it though the recommended extra 20 minute cycle. I just finished cooking with it. My smoke alarm didn’t go off. A miracle!!! The meat cooked well with some charring with an extended cook time (which I prefer). I’m sold on this product!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca R

customer_reviews.title: It’s actually fun to cook on!
customer_reviews.text: I must say I really enjoy cooking on this grill more than expected! It does a really good job! Best of all it’s easy to clean. Just follow the seasoning instructions in the manual and you should have no problems! My son has loved both things I’ve cooked so far on it! Makes apartment living bearable again when it comes to food options. And there is no smoke at all. Really worth the money! I use it on my stove for one it’s a level surface but two, safety of having a vent available just in case. But this thing there’s no flames or grease concerns after making chicken on it as my pics show! I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Donald Sorenson

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY THIS GRILL!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought the grill and tried to cook 4 medium sized hamburgers. The grill only cooks the parts of the burgers directly over the elements, and after 30 minutes they were burned on the outside and still medium rare on the inside and the edges of the burgers were raw. Complete piece of junk. Would give 0 stars if I could. DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bill Skelton

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have used it once and was not happy. The first thing I cooked was hamburgers and they turned out dry and leathery on outside but raw on inside. I bought this grill to have an outdoor grilled taste inside without the bother of cooking outside. I am very disappointed. I will try again but if no better I will either sell to someone or donate to Goodwill like I do with a lot of things I buy and don’t like.
customer_reviews.author: Lindy W

customer_reviews.title: Good! Just what I need!
customer_reviews.text: I am glad to purchased it! Living in a apartment,we are not allowed grills on our outdoor space. Also, I live in California, it's HOT here in the summer, I don’t like standing over a grill in hot sun. This is perfect as I can grill inside in the comfort of my A/C. I love seafood, I tried shrimp, salmon and tuna, it works really good! I invited some friends to my home have indoor seafood barbecue,I had a good time with my friends ! I am very happy with this grill!
customer_reviews.author: Zoe

customer_reviews.title: Smokefree indoor grill
customer_reviews.text: First of all, it's very easy to disassembly and it means it's easy to clean :) When I start to grill Pork Valley it absorbed all smoke and it's really smoke free!! And it's not sticky and not much effort to clean the fan. Nonstick and Nonsmoke~ which are what I really want ^^
customer_reviews.author: Joy Jang

customer_reviews.title: the heating leaves a lot to be desired
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for use with thinly sliced meats for korean bbq. It can get the job done but takes way too long to get up to heat and even when on max it doesn't seem quite hot enough.
customer_reviews.author: J D iii

customer_reviews.title: Assemble took a while ,but worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Overall 4.5 stars I had a raclette party with this new grill ,and it went smoothly ,didn't let me down ,variable heating is dope ,foods cooked well and I like the design ,you can leave some vegs ,on the second shelf ,I recommend a whole corn ,or potatoes ,they tastes really good after fully cooked . Just took me a bit time cleaning it since I have to unassembled it ,clean it ,and assembled it back together ,but overall ,worth it .
customer_reviews.author: Elephant Zuckerberg

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean,  highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: My family wanted do bbq so I bought this indoor grill. It’s absolutely amazing. The way it cooks meat is amazing, its so tender, taste so good. It has a fan feature that you can turn on the catch the smoke. Most importantly, it’s SUPER EASY to clean. It has a plate that you have to fill with water, so when the oil sinks to the bottom, it would float on top. It doesn’t get oily or messy. Definitely the best buy I have made in awhile.
customer_reviews.author: happyFamily

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. saved the hassle of charcoal and smoke. Underneath the grill rack there is a hidden container to collect oil. Very easy to clean. The barbecue tastes fantastic as there is no partial burned spot like other grill. Overall very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Mona

customer_reviews.title: very clean easy
customer_reviews.text: Very good oven, suitable for indoor use. There is really no oil smoke. You can use it safely. You can barbecue at home in the future. It is hygienic and clean, and you don't need to order takeout. It has a lot of firepower. It is cooked at once. You do it yourself and like it very much. ..
customer_reviews.author: Ryan lin

customer_reviews.title: nice grill
customer_reviews.text: like this a lot. clearer instructions would have been helpful, that's why 4 not 5 stars. very easy to clean. definitely recommend using on stovetop with exhaust fan on, if you use any kind of cooking spray on the grill plate. not sure if cooking spray is needed, other than initial seasoning or setup. have used so far for burgers and filet, came out great-burgers cook at 390, steak at 450.
customer_reviews.author: ann conrad

customer_reviews.title: My korean bbq is WEEPING..possible defect?
customer_reviews.text: Did I get a defective product..? On a normal griddle, I can cook my korean Bbq so easily and quick. This is taking FOREVER, and it doesn’t even cook it hot enough so the fat is rendered and crispy.. The LED light, is also slightly off?? And not all the icons are lit well. Really wanted to love this, but this was so disappointing. Are the other reviews real..?
customer_reviews.author: Robert Kim

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: There was no instruction on how to screw in the lid handle to the lid properly however we sort of used our intuition and figured it out. First time using it today, we love almost everything about it. However, it isn't really "smokeless." The fan does help remove majority of the smoke but our dyson air purifier was warning us that we have extremely poor air quality the entire duration of our meal. So... the smokeless part of it is debatable. Waiting for it to cool down now hopefully cleaning it will be easy and straight forward.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Wu

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this purchase, we love BBQ, and now it can be winter as well, When I received it, can’t wait to next day, just use it right away, and it works perfectly, recommend to put vegetables like broccoli, corns on the small tray, after fully cooked, really good taste, and it is very easy to clean, my whole family love it so much.
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: Great for Apartment Living!
customer_reviews.text: I got this Techwood smokeless grill a little over a month ago and love it. Living in an apartment, I don't have access to a gas/charcoal grill so this grill does the trick instead. It is very easy to take apart and clean. As for use, it is great to use. Just don't forget to add water to the bottom tray before grilling. Of course, flavor is all about how you marinate your meat before grilling. I've tried marinated steaks and chicken breasts and they both turned out great. Definitely worth the purchase if you are looking for the perfect smokeless grill.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smokeless and grilled a perfect medium rare steak indoors!
customer_reviews.text: We are so excited about this product. We grilled strip steaks on it and actually the finished product was better than an outdoor grill. The grill heated immediately to our preference of 450 degrees and there was no smoke as the fan sucked it in. It was very easy to use on our granite kitchen countertop. The steaks were juicy and had beautiful grill marks on them. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Eric W. Hammerschmidt

customer_reviews.title: Bad heating technology?
customer_reviews.text: This machine is sturdy and easy to use. It’s a slow crawl to preheat. The temp dial is off about 40 degrees. Slow recovery time after adding food. Heats unevenly...there are hot and cold spots on the grill...the food shows it. Even turned all the way up this machine struggled to top 415 degrees.
customer_reviews.author: Fan of None

customer_reviews.title: not as I expected
customer_reviews.text: not real happy with the the smokelessgrill ( helps with smoke but takes forever to cook)Pork chops/boneless chicken breast bacon didn't do well. Will keep trying on other meats,
customer_reviews.author: myrna

customer_reviews.title: Great Grill!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing bbq grill! The grill itself is not too heavy which makes it easy to handle, but it's also big enough to grill enough food without too much of a wait. The small pans on the bottom are super useful for cooking some side food (like cheese, bread, etc)- and it's so cute as well! It's also so easy to clean after use, so that's a plus! Overall, I'd really recommend this for anyone who is looking for a good grill for a family gathering, party, or celebration.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Something you need a barbecue ()()()
customer_reviews.text: Barbecue time.I don’t need to read the instructions at all . It take less than five minutes to load ......I don’t like barbecuing outside .mosquitoes are abundant. this is basically smoke -free .style atmosphere .like red looks comfortable...I lose weight recently the rest os the pan fried chicken breast all browned.. I don’t use oil . Use this rest fried chicken breast is good!!and a lot to wait for in .... find out. Hahah. Good. Good.better than using carbon
customer_reviews.author: Joe zheng

customer_reviews.title: Very good grilling experience on the first time
customer_reviews.text: For my first grilling I tried chicken breasts cut in half and they turned out great--juicy, with nice grill marks. My wife and I are already planning so many dinners. The unit was easy to setup and easy to clean & store. It did not produce very much smoke and the smoke was contained/captured by the fan. I would like a slightly longer AC electric cable. To be fair, in the user guide, they do acknowledge why they kept it shorter.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: This food prep unit works well; it's worth another look.
customer_reviews.text: At first, we weren't real sure if this product was exactly what we wanted, but we gave it a try and were pleasantly surprised with its performance. The only things I would change if I could would be for the manufacturer to add a glass top to the unit for a better cooking experience, and to make the frame that holds the grill/griddle less sharp to the touch as it is real easy to cut your fingers on it if you aren't careful. The cooking surfaces are very easy to clean, but make sure not to use any utensils or cleaning products that may scratch them. Maybe a more durable surface material or coating would be better for future consideration
customer_reviews.author: Bertie Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Easy to wash and get heat quickly
customer_reviews.text: Very well designed electric grill. Smokeless totally with the building fan makes cooking is outstanding!!! Just like a typical gas grill without the hassle. Do make sure add some water in the base oil tray so that it’s easy to wash out the oil. I cooked beef, pork, fish and various veg to figure out how to cook to my desires and not burn or under cook. Very easy to clean. We now can safely grill inside and have great looking and tasting food!! Excellent Amazon product you will not find in big stores
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Would have given five stars overall...
customer_reviews.text: ...if the griddle was included like most other brands. Seriously, one company manufactures these under many different brand names. Many include a griddle option. I bought this because other gave it good reviews and I concur, it's a nice appliance for the money. It works as advertised. Easy to Clean. But buying the griddle afterwards doesn't seem to be an option and no one really knows why.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen griller
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product at the recommendation of my sister-in-law, an avid cook who researches any product she buys. So far we have really enjoyed it. My husband, who said we didn't need it as we had an outside grill, was the first to open and use it. He now insists we store it out on the counter. He cooked something that wasn't very fatty so haven't fully tested it yet, but my S-I-L, who has tested it, says that as long as you remember to put in the required water, it works beautifully. We're looking forward to some pork chops this weekend - and we won't have to worry about it raining!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Ives

customer_reviews.title: How did I live without this?
customer_reviews.text: I am older and just tired of everything I needed to do just to grill something outside at my apartment for just my husband and I. I am so happy with this. I started off with my husbands favorite. Hamburgers! They turned out perfect! My son owns a business that sell steaks, seafood, chicken & pork, so he is always bringing me steaks. The steaks were perfectly done and very juicy. I haven't had it very long, but so far I love it!
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: Grillin' it right!
customer_reviews.text: This grill is awesome! We cooked our KBBQ style meats along with filet mignon with scallops and it was GREAT! Truly smokeless and the aroma of food filled the house. The hard part cleaning up after a full stomache!!! The grill cleans extremely easy!!! Nothing stuck to the grill and no scraping needed to be done. Extremely happy with the purchase. Hopefully this grill last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Jammer

customer_reviews.title: High pitched sound kills my ears!!!
customer_reviews.text: There's a high pitched sound that happens when the fan is on. It's high enough to where I can't keep it on. This is really really disappointing. And in the Q&A someone else has this issue. And you can't find out about it unless you use the product, which makes it unreturnable. This is garbage!
customer_reviews.author: J.H.

customer_reviews.title: unhappy customer
customer_reviews.text: i used this once right after it arrived and i found it somewhat complicated to use. it burnt my food and i wasn’t sure how to add any oil in order to keep it from sticking i just tried using it for a second time last night it would NOT turn on at all i am EXTREMELY disappointed and would NOT recommend it
customer_reviews.author: nlw

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good cooker.
customer_reviews.text: I love that I can cook indoors without the smoke! It is fairly easy to clean and use. What I don’t like is that it takes a long time to cook the meat. When I cook hamburger patties the outside of the burger stays red around the edges. Overall I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Lyon

customer_reviews.title: first table top griller for us
customer_reviews.text: We loved this after the first try. It is smokeless. At the very least, it didn't activate our smoke alarm. The wife complained that we still smelled like barbecue afterwards but that's the nature of grilling. The manual is very limited but there's not much to read about this. I'd expect us to be making more indoor barbecue now especially with the bad air quality in our area lately.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Barayoga

customer_reviews.title: Smokeless but takes too long to cook
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this grill. The product does deliver on the smokeless promise which is great. However, it takes 2.5 times longer to cook meat ( that was cut to half normal thickness). Maybe a lid/cover would help keep heat in and speed up cooking I simply don’t have the time to waste that this requires to cook. I’ve used this item 3 times (chicken breast, shrimp, burgers, zucchini ) and it has been relocated to the very back of the cupboard (behind my cuisinart grill/press).
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer614

customer_reviews.title: Main Problem: Not hot enough - 100% not recommended
customer_reviews.text: Summary: I do not recommend this grill to anyone. Heat is one of the most important part of a grill Like: 1) Easy to setup 2) definitely lessen the smoke Dislike: 1) Not enough heat - just sausage on my test run would take a while to cook and they are not hot. I have tried sausage/steak/ribs. 2) Cord is wayyy too short, you will 100% need an extension cord
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Great indoor grill
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for an indoor grill, this one has great size, is smokeless and easy to use and clean. We live in NY in an apartment so we were looking for a safe not so big not so small option. This grill is perfect I can use it either indoors or outside in the balcony. A healthy option if you want to eat grilled. I totally recommend and planning to buy another for my mother
customer_reviews.author: Blpiggeonoutt

customer_reviews.title: Good little indoor grill
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good little product. I seasoned it as described in the packaging and cooked some chicken breasts with onion after that was done. Very juicy and flavorful, cannot wait to grill some more on it. My townhouse does not allow outdoor grills so this is perfect for us., The only downside is that you must use a bit thinner but of meat for a quick more even cook, but it is totally worth it. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Mabry

customer_reviews.title: Not quite charcoal but a really good substitute.
customer_reviews.text: It cooks a great steak. I've only used it once but it was easy to use and clean up simple. The instructions say there's a washable white filter included and to take it out and wash it each time you use it. There is no such filter. Don't waste your time figuring it out! I called and talked to 4 different people and learned that its not a necessary feature.
customer_reviews.author: nlm1957

customer_reviews.title: Nice smokeless indoor grill
customer_reviews.text: Works well, easy to clean and hasn't smoked at all. Only criticism is that it doesn't get quite hot enough for steaks in my opinion. Takes about twice as long to cook a steak as a normal outdoor grill, but does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Rider16

customer_reviews.title: Not So Hot
customer_reviews.text: I so hoped this was going to work. I do a lot of Sous Vide cooking and needed a way to sear the meat after cooking. But this so called grill is not up to the job. It just will not get hot enough to sear you food. I can't imagine cooking a steak on it. It would take 20 min. The fan works Ok but then again it is not hot enough to make much smock. I sent it back and will just use a cast-iron pan.
customer_reviews.author: M. Cannon

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS GRILL!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the techwood raclette grill. It heats up quickly and cooks steak, chicken very well. It charred the steak nicely and in minimum time and cooked it to a perfect medium rare. I also love the cheese pans and cooked peppers, onions and cheeses in them. I highly recommend this grill.
customer_reviews.author: Richie M

customer_reviews.title: Good grill, could be hotter temp
customer_reviews.text: Only gave 4 stars. Excellent in all respects,but it didn't seem as hot as I expected. Maybe its just me. Cooked hamburgers and they were good. It is smokeless. Toasted hamburger buns. Also good. When I cook steak I'll review again. Purchased because of all 5 star reviews. But I think it a bit overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: Carla Wright

customer_reviews.title: doesn't get hot enough
customer_reviews.text: I bought this specifically to grill the most amazing marinated skirt steaks from Freedom Meat Locker in Watsonville, CA. It took almost 45 minutes to get them to rare doneness, for what would have taken 7 minutes at the most stovetop or on an outside gas grill. Everything else about the Grill was perfect--super easy to clean!!! Absolutely smokeless!! Easy to set up! But we were all starving and my son had to catch a flight so we had to race through dinner. I don't think I'll ever use it again. So disappointed
customer_reviews.author: E Laren

customer_reviews.title: The grill meets multiple requirements outstandingly
customer_reviews.text: The overall size is great for Condo living. The cooking surface is amazing large and can easily cook 6 - 8 hamburgers or 6 steaks. Last night I cooked a couple hamburgers and 3 pounds of sausage for later meals. The odor from cooking is minimal, I only noticed slight cooking odors the next morning. The temperature control is outstanding. Cleanup was as advertised, I placed the lid, grilling surface, pan and water tray in the dishwasher and all parts were completely clean after washing. As a bonus the unit fit easily on the panty shelf awaiting its next grilling of chicken breasts and veggies.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: There could be more directions added
customer_reviews.text: Used this grill for the first time tonight. The directions for how much water to add to the bowl did not exist. There was no instructions for how to put the bolts on the handles. I was pleasantly surprised by how quiet the fan is on this grill. Overall nice indoor grill. I will be recommending this product
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Stopped using this grill
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t cook evenly, tried burgers and steaks and dint do as expected. Would have returned it but by the third use we were past the return window.
customer_reviews.author: AY

customer_reviews.title: You will wish you had ordered this sooner!
customer_reviews.text: We love our smokeless grill! Burgers, chops, and bacon are easy and there is no greasy mess to clean up afterwards. We highly recommend this grill!
customer_reviews.author: Jane Piraro

customer_reviews.title: It WOrks!
customer_reviews.text: It really is significantly smokeless! Made Galbi ribs on it.. if I had done it on the stove the house, the house would have been full of smoke... but using the same marinade recipe on the Techwood grill, they came out beautifully with wonderful grill marks! No house full of smoke. Easy to use, easy the clean, great flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy H

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I was unsure about the smokeless effectiveness, but the unit works great, the lid is a good addition to keep food warm once is cooked, the design is really good, I'll recommend this and would buy again if needed
customer_reviews.author: Enrique M. Perez

customer_reviews.title: Indoor grilling this winter in MN will be great!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this grill. We just cooked pork chops and they turned out nice and moist and done perfectly. It didn’t take long for them to cook through either. The delivery of the grill was quick. Love the red color. We’re very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: LM's Wife

customer_reviews.title: It's the best thing since the wheel!!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I are blown away at how much this makes steak taste just like the outdoor grill. Wow!! And on top of that...no smoke!!! AND...it is so darn easy to clean. I told my husband that this indoor grill is now my favorite kitchen appliance of all time. Can't say enough good things about it.
customer_reviews.author: MARKAY MULL

customer_reviews.title: Nice for indoor grilling
customer_reviews.text: This grill is really easy to set up and use. And cleaning it after use is fairly easy, too. It cooks meat very evenly and the meat retains its moisture so it is not tough and dry after cooking. Overall it is a very nice unit.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smokeless
customer_reviews.text: This is so convenient to use. Smokeless! Flavor is not the same but still good. Can cook thick slices of new york steak. This is good in cooking thin slices of korean bbq ribs. Gave 4 star due to little round holes are not easy to clean and non stick coating seems to be getting removed after a month use. I will still definitely recommend to buy this. You can grill inside the house without SMOKE!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: TECHWOOD SMOKELES GRILL
customer_reviews.text: it is very nice grill and it is easy to use. and this is my first smokeless grill and like it very much
customer_reviews.author: lien

customer_reviews.title: very nice raclette grill
customer_reviews.text: The reason I like this grill is because it is electric. I don't really like using the horrible charcoal grills because it makes lots of smoke and its hard to clean. This raclette grill, however, makes things much easier because it is easy to clean up and it is non stick. I recommend it for families 4 to 6 people.
customer_reviews.author: Li wen Xie

customer_reviews.title: This is an incredible way to grill indoors!
customer_reviews.text: It just arrived, and I grilled chicken on it. All the juice was sealed in because of the lid, it was perfect. Can't wait to grill vegetables. No smoke at all, and easy to clean. It was 116 degrees here today. Do I love a good indoor grill? Indeed I do!
customer_reviews.author: Alan Jones

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I live in an apartment where gas grill is a no no, I like to grill but my previous indoor grill made a lot of smoke during grilling that activated smoke alarm every time. Thanks to this smokeless grill I can enjoy grilling a steak or a chicken breast without activating the smoke alarm. The grill is easy to use and clean, but it has some issue with all the parts assembled, they don’t sit right with one another, wobbling a little bit at the corner, even though it does not seem to have any problem but I think it could be better engineeringly speaking. Good value for the performance/money wise, time will tell if it hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Tran

customer_reviews.title: Awesome indoor grill!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product. It does not grill the same as your charcoal/propane grill. You will need to grill with it a few times to get used to how it cooks. Everything I have grilled so far has been totally smokeless. Clean up is actually a breeze. For indoor grilling, this is the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Efinch

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Food comes out delicious. The only thing I don't like about it is that it doesn't come with a recipe book or something that tells you what temperature to cook certain foods with, you will have to figure that part out yourself. It was easy to clean. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Korean BBQ at home
customer_reviews.text: Craving Korean bbq , with Covid going on , we can eat out as a family with comfort. This grill made it happen. Easy to install Easy to clean Fan Works great Temp cooks good , however we’ve only grilled thinly sliced beef n pork . Have not yet tried thick cuts.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy xayavongsy

customer_reviews.title: Yummy Food
customer_reviews.text: Been wanting one for a while and glad I went with this model. One thing was included without being listed. A digital thermometer was included. Wished they were still in stock, give for Christmas gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny B

customer_reviews.title: For the lover in you this is a must have
customer_reviews.text: I just got my grill today and could not wait to use it..I love that it is so easy to set up and use and it came in my favorite color red and fits perfectly on my countertop, this is the perfect gift. I love to grill so I know this will be used almost daily
customer_reviews.author: Madeline Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Great features, no mess cleanup.
customer_reviews.text: Love this indoor grill, we use it just about every night and yes, it is smokeless! It is very easy to clean ,everything pops into the dishwasher. It is awesome to use, grill like an outdoor grill without smoke and cook like an inside stove with grill plate.
customer_reviews.author: July 24

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I just received my grill today! It's just like it was described. I am looking forward to using it and making healthier meals. My neighborhood had one and I had a delicious meal and couldn't believe how well it cooked and the flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny S

customer_reviews.title: This product is great!
customer_reviews.text: We have used this to cook steak, chicken and pork bellies and we love it. The only drawback is that its not as powerful as a gas grill but you can't expect too much from a indoor electric grill I guess. Highly recommend for those lazy days you want to grill indoors.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Lee

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for indoor BBQ party of 4 max.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good item for indoor grill or barbecue it’s not 100% smokeless but when you turn on the fan it does help to suck the smoke and make it less smoke. And you will still need to open your window to help the smoke out.
customer_reviews.author: Cocoa Milk

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I live in a small apartment and love this grill. I can use it for veggies, steak, chicken, burgers, and fish (Those are the foods I have used it for so far)- I use the vent in it and it helps, and it doesnt smoke. Its easy to clean, and I clean it after I use twice or if it was fish.
customer_reviews.author: Bianca

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and heat
customer_reviews.text: I follow all instructions from first time users to clean and storage. Works perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Liliana Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Great electric grill
customer_reviews.text: Made our family bbq activities easier. We use it a lot in daily life. My kids love it. It does what it is supposed to do. I had some concerns before I buy but, after testing I concluded that it functions very well. The small pans are also cooking nicely. We are very much satisfied as a family with this product. Just a suggestion, if the edges are made a bit higher it would be better to cook very oily stuff. The addition of a drip tray would make it perfect.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this this grill. This is perfect for the taste of an outdoor grill but with the ease of the portable indoor cooking. I live in an apartment and am older so this gives me the best of both worlds, barbecue taste and ease of use.
customer_reviews.author: Lillian Breen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect countertop cooker
customer_reviews.text: I tried it last night . It was smokeless!!! This was very important to me. To grill indoors without having to air out my house, It also cleaned easily . I will be grilling indoors now instead of outside
customer_reviews.author: william lopez

customer_reviews.title: Almost smokeless.
customer_reviews.text: Have had good luck cooking with this grill. Meat is still moist and not dried out. Cooking hamburgers made it smoke so that I had to turn on the fan in the apartment but cooking steaks it was great.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Great Grill for the indoor
customer_reviews.text: We live in a tiny home with tiny dining area and have no space for a large outdoor grill, this was perfect size and use for us. I was skeptical about it being smokeless, but it is actually smokeless, even when we popped in a piece of marinated pork. The heat is strong enough to grill anything eatable. Great product and absolutely love it. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Ho

customer_reviews.title: Best gift for a guy!
customer_reviews.text: The first one they sent me I think was a used one or they just forgot to put in the power cord before they sent it to me but we got a replacement which was super easy and the Customer service that we called to talk to them about what had happened was awesome! They helped with replacement processes quickly and thoroughly! I got it for my bf for Christmas and It works soo well he LOVESSSS it!
customer_reviews.author: Joy Feinstein

customer_reviews.title: Amazing kitchen gadget and value!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it! Big enough for a family. So many other brands are just small and can't really prepare an entire meal at one time. That's no problem here! Heats really fast, and no smoke!
customer_reviews.author: John Guarascio

customer_reviews.title: it broke after the support window
customer_reviews.text: This is a great smokeless bbq grill and my family loves it. However, it suddenly broke after several use. it's still within a year of purchase but i couldn't find the contact to exchange any parts? it was still fine the last time we used it, somehow it just doesn't turn on all of a sudden! disappointed. ------ September 1st 2020 , I fixed it. so it's a great smokeless grill again!!hooray
customer_reviews.author: jane lin

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: There are two great features for me. First I know and can control the temperature. The second is that if I turn the fan on, it is smokeless. It meets all the claims of the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Shebrew

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: The Techwood grill is easy to use and very easy to clean. Was surprised with the ease of cleaning. I have cooked New York strip steaks, chicken breasts and hamburgers on the grill. Hamburgers are delicious! Steaks were not as delish as outdoor grilling, but I didn't expect them to be. But, they were good and I will use a thinner cut steak next time. Chicken breasts were delish also. I use a lot of lemon pepper, Tony's Creole Seasoning, and garlic which makes everything even better!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn P.

customer_reviews.title: Close enough to smokeless
customer_reviews.text: Very good indoor smokeless grill. Would not say it is 100/ smokeless but close enough, just make sure to put water in the water tray. Only other con is the fan is a bit noisy. overall good product no regrets.
customer_reviews.author: donna

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: Very little smoke to none. Cooks great and easy to use and to clean.Like it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Ipock

customer_reviews.title: Cord is way too short
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this is a wonderful grill. My only complaint is that the cord is incredibly short, making it hard to move it around. I expected this grill to be a little bigger since the photo shows tons of food on it. On my first use, I was able to fit 4 chicken breasts and 2 burgers on it. Very nice indoor grill!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice grill
customer_reviews.text: It is so amazing,the smokeless grill works well.We can enjoy the barbeque during the fall and the winter now and no worry about the smokes and oily in the house.The material of the grill is easy to clean up.I am so happy that I found this smokeless grill.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: KOREAN BBQ AT HOME
customer_reviews.text: During this quarantine my wife and I were craving Korean BBQ, but all the restaurants in our area had been closed. We heard about this and picked it up ASAP. It's awesome! We may never have to go to a Korean BBQ spot again. Ok, maybe when everything opens back up, but this is a great alternative!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Valdez

customer_reviews.title: Nope.
customer_reviews.text: Tried two separate times getting this unit. Each time there were QC issues. Scuff marks on one unit. The other unit I received, there were scratches on the grilling surface itself. ((Get a 60.00 George Foreman instead.))
customer_reviews.author: J.T.

customer_reviews.title: Solid Indoor Grill
customer_reviews.text: This grill is solid. So far I have made pork chops and brats. This grill gives good grill lines and the flavor is good. It does tend to cook a bit slower than I would like but it's just something to get used to. No smoke what so ever. Will be doing burgers on this at some point. Overall good product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Has all the features I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Has all the features I wanted. Griddle deck, sturdy glass cover, safety shut off. Truly smokeless and a quality product. Use it all the time at our second hone where outside barbecues are not an option.
customer_reviews.author: Tom B

customer_reviews.title: good grill
customer_reviews.text: I really like my new Techwood Grill! it "s great
customer_reviews.author: bobby

product_meta.title: Techwood Raclette Grill Raclette Party Grill Electric BBQ Grill Indoor/Outdoor Grill 1500W Removable Non-Stick Grill Plate Temperature Control
feature_bullets: [LARGE COOKING SURFACE] - The ideal gourmet smokless grill comes with a large Non-Stick cooking plate 18.5 x 9 inches, making it great for getting friends and family around the table with delicious food. The 1500 watts power electric grill effortlessly melts cheese, cook up meats, veggies and seafood just in minutes.

[REVERSIBLE GRILL PLATE] - The electric raclette grill plate provides uniform heat and comes with a grooved and flat surface for versatile cooking options. The grooved side allows you grill desired food shade and removes frying fat easily. Flat cooking surface is perfect for creating delicious crepes, which makes it versatile for cooking morning breakfast such as pancakes and eggs.

[ADJUSTABLE TEMPERATURE] - The raclette grill is equipped with an adjustable thermostat and visible indicator lights. It allows you create a myriad of delicious raclette recipes such as cooking meat, vegetables, seafood, or warming sauce.

[HEALTHY COOKING] - The raclette has 8 individual grill pans for raclette cheese, cooking sides and sauces. It is also suitable for keeping food warm. Non-stick coating of the top plate and pans for healthier cooking with no need for butters or oils.

[GET YOURS NOW, RISK-FREE] - Techwood offer a outstanding 30-day hassle-free return policy & 18-month warranty. We assure you that no other countertop burner beats our products' high-caliber quality & efficiency. All our products are covered by Product Liability Insurance of United States.If you have any problems with our electric grill, please feel free to contact us.
